answers.text: The Washington Institute for Near East Policy

qas.question: What is WINEPS target countries as?
How does WINEP bundle the countries of Northwest Africa?

context: <a0_0>The Washington Institute for Near East Policy<a0_0/> (WINEP) is a non-profit organization for research and advice on Middle Eastern policy. It regards its target countries as <a1_0>the Middle East<a1_0/> but adopts the convention of calling them the Near East to be in conformance with the practices of the State Department. Its views are independent. The WINEP bundles the countries of Northwest Africa together <a2_0>under "North Africa."<a2_0/> Details can be found in Policy Focus #65.
